Scratchy

A simple Eleventy starter site that tracks the eleventy base blog for simplicity and features.

Features

  • simple
  • clean
  • minimal
  • no tailwindcss I have nothing against tailwind, just in the spirit of keeping things simple, it add an overhead we don't need.
  • blog

I don't know any eleventy so I'm using this starter template to learn it.

Resources

  • 11ty.rocks
  • Learn eleventy from scratch
  • Sia codes
